basics.name: Emily Pham
basics.label: Student at the University of Hawaii
basics.summary: I am pursuing a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Engineering and a minor in Japanese in the Department of East Asian Languages & Literature. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

education.institution: University of Hawaii: Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: As part of a team, worked alongside the teachers to care for children from ages 2 to 4 years old
Being a senior aide, acted as a substitute teacher on numerous occasions
Took customer's orders, prepared beverages, and restocked topping bar in an efficient manner
Maintained a clean and tidy kitchen and dining area to ensure a safe environment

awards.title: Provost Achievement (formerly Chancellor’s) Scholarship
awards.summary: One of the The New Warrior Scholarships that is awarded to new incoming students which provides recognition and support to outstanding students based on their academic accomplishments and contributions to their community.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii College of Engineering
awards.summary: Signifies a student's completion of 12 or more credits with a GPA of 3.5 or higher, and recognizes their overall excellent academic performance for the semester.
